Are you a UIC Student?  Are you interested in being part of the Student Centers Family? Would you like the opportunity to work in a fun, welcoming environment?  If you've answered YES to all 3 questions, we would like for you to join our team.  To qualify for employment at The Alley, you must be:   Registered University of Illinois at Chicago Student for at least 6 credit hours  Must have open availability on weekends   The Alley will conduct the majority of the hiring before each new semester begins. For this reason, we encourage applying early. Availability is also a large factor in the hiring process for most areas. Applicants willing to work opening and weekend shifts are typically preferred. For those not selected, we recommend re-applying before the start of each new semester with an updated application and availability sheet.  To qualify for employment in Student Centers as a building manager you must be:   Registered University of Illinois at Chicago Student for at least 6 credit hours  Two years of employment history or classified as a Sophomore student. Must be able to work early mornings, late evenings/nights, and on weekends. Must be able to work under minimum supervision. Must have a Valid Driver’s license and be able to successfully complete AED/First Aid Certification.  Student employees are both hired as regular and federal work study (FWS) employees. FWS students are given priority for job placement.       Applications        The Alley Application  To be considered to work in The Alley Bowling & Billiards, turn your application into the front desk at The Alley.
